trans-unit.source: Add a banner to the homepage of your store to highlight your sales and new products in a visual and friendly way.
trans-unit.target: Dodajte pasico na domačo stran svoje trgovine, da na vizualen in prijazen način poudarite svojo prodajo in nove izdelke.

trans-unit.source: Enter the link associated to your banner. When clicking on the banner, the link opens in the same window. If no link is entered, it redirects to the homepage.
trans-unit.target: Vnesite povezavo za vašo pasico. Ko kliknete na pasico se bo povezava odprla v istem oknu. Če povezava ni nastavljena bo samodejno preusmerjeno na domačo stran.

trans-unit.source: Please enter a short but meaningful description for the banner.
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, vnesi kratek a pomenljiv opis pasice.

trans-unit.source: Upload an image for your top banner. The recommended dimensions are 1110 x 214px if you are using the default theme.
trans-unit.target: Naložite sliko za vašo pasico. Priporočena velikost je 1110 x 214px če uporabljate privzeto predlogo.
